verbs.description: [ARG1: idaho teachers in border wall halloween costumes] [V: put] [ARG2: on leave] 14 staff members at an idaho school district who donned caricatured outfits depicting mexican people and a border wall emblazoned with make america great again have been placed on paid administrative leave idaho
